definition: water so clear you can see the bottom
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: Foot of the mountain there is a clear bottoming out of the creek, streams next to the terraces.
sentences.chinese: 山脚下有一条清澈见底的小溪，小溪旁边是梯田。

sentences.english: This pool, clear to the bottom, is said to be the "Xi Shi River Port".
sentences.chinese: 这水池清澈见底，传说是“西施河埠”。

sentences.english: The water of Baisha Ancient Well is very clear, and can be drinkable.
sentences.chinese: 白沙井井水清澈见底，可以饮用。

sentences.english: Since precious, it should let it clear out, the two sides tree-shaded.
sentences.chinese: 既然珍贵，那就更要让它清澈见底，两岸绿树成荫。

sentences.english: The mountain stream changed has been black, no longer was before that clear enough to see bottom rill.
sentences.chinese: 溪水变黑了，已不再是以前那条清澈见底的小溪了。

sentences.english: As far as I recall, there used to be a clean river near my village at that time.
sentences.chinese: 就我回忆，那时我们村边有一条清澈见底的小河。

sentences.english: The water was clear to the bottom. A school of tiny fish flicked hither and thither.
sentences.chinese: 河水清澈见底，一群小鱼悠然地游来游去。

sentences.english: Front of my house there is a crystal clear river.
sentences.chinese: 我家门前有一条清澈见底的小河。

definition: variant of 透徹|透彻[tou4 che4]
Bitan or Green Pool on Xindian Creek 新店溪[Xin1 dian4 xi1], Taipei county, Taiwan
gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
mouth of a spring or fountain
